JOB DESCRIPTION: Position Requirements   1. 9 - 12 years of overall experience with 2-4 yrs of experience in product-integration.  2. Able to lead/drive with prior experience on web development, microservices architecture and integration technologies  3. Strong hands-on experience in CORE JAVA (1.8) and J2EE  4. Strong hands-on experience in web application development including Spring frameworks  6. Experience in messaging and other intgration frameworks and would have worked on at least one messaging server applications like ActiveMQ, IBM MQ etc  7. Exposure and understanding of production grade web app deployments   8. Experience in overall lifecycle of build, deploy, test is must.  9. Exposure on Cloud Architecture and understanding of cloud providers such as GCP.  10. Exposure to any Enterprise Integraion Solution like webMethods is a plus.
